name: Dino Land VR - Virtual Tour
description:
Dinosaurs roamed the planet for about 165 million years, during a time in the Earth’s history called the Mesozoic Era. Travel back in time to the Mesozoic era to walk alongside the biggest dinosaurs to have ever walked the earth. Introducing to you for the first time, a virtual reality tour that is going to blow your mind away!
Explore the world-famous dinosaur exhibits on this self-guided VR tour featuring the largest animals to have ever walked the Earth. Watch the VR dinosaurs closely as they roam about in a detailed VR dinosaur game.
Gaze at the life-size stomping dinosaurs in a VR tour to have a bone-chilling experience in VR world! An insanely GREAT and FREE VR dinosaur game with an endless array of dinosaurs that where you watch each creatures’ thrilling close-up and roam around amazing sites in VR.
Enjoy the virtual reality tour through dinosaur simulator app in VR to experience the most interesting 3D graphics with an addictive gameplay and awesome VR game controls. Enhance your VR games experience with highly immersive and impressive game - Dino land VR.
Dino Land VR lets you enjoy a realistic experience of Mesozoic era of dinosaurs while sitting comfortably on your couch through Virtual Reality, which combines with stunning and HD quality graphics. Install Dino Land VR to enjoy the best VR adventure tour!

NOTE: For an unforgettable experience, you can take the VR tour of dinosaurs by popping your Gyroscope-enabled Android phone into Google Cardboard, or any other compatible VR glasses.

VR SETTINGS:
- Play the demo on your smartphone
- Put the Smartphone VR Glasses like 4DUD, Google Cardboard
- Align your phone in center
- Check for blurriness... rotate lens for proper focus
- Wear your Google glasses and enjoy the VR dinosaur game

MOVEMENT CONTROLS:
- Move around to look at the dinosaurs and environment
- Focus at the footsteps to start walking
- Roam around freely by focusing in any direction to flying
- Look around the VR world and focus in any direction to automatically walk in that direction
- To stop, focus on the footsteps and there you go!
- Enjoy 360 degree views of the Dino land by looking around

DINOSAURS IN DINO LAND VR:
- Pteranodon (The flying dinosaur)
- Ankylosaurus
- Carnotaurus
- Parasaurolophus
- Tyrannosaurus

VR DINO LAND FEATURES:
- Amazingly detailed 3D environment
- Realistic Dinosaur sounds
- Explore your favorite dinosaurs in this breathtaking adventure VR tour
- Easy controls, simply look where you want to go
- Unique virtual reality (VR) game
- Compatible with virtual reality glasses such as 4DUD, Google Cardboard VR
- Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals
- Developed for high end phones which have Gyro Sensor

This demo is compatible with 4DUD VR Glasses, Google Cardboard, Durovis Dive, Vrase, Samsung Gear VR, Carl Zeiss VR one, Archos / Colorcross and other DIY Oculus Rift, HTC Vive or Microsoft Hololens etc.

Tulip apps is constantly working to provide the most immersive VR tours to the Virtual Reality Lovers. Please Rate & share the VR app to promote us!
Visit our web page at: www.tulipapps.com/

We don't collect any personal information , any non-personal information collected by our partners like Google is used for analytic and game improvements. For details check here
http://www.tulipapps.com/privacy.htm
